translations: n．笨蛋，傻瓜：指智力低下、愚蠢或缺乏判断力的人。
· Don't listen to those nitwits, they don't know what they're talking about.
别听那些傻瓜的话，他们根本不知道自己在说什么。

sentences.sentence: I can't fathom how these two nitwits managed to implode in the bottom of the seventh inning.
sentences.translation: 我实在无法想像这二个笨蛋是怎么样能在七局下半自爆的！
